title: Trump's big swing at credit card interest rates targets a growing American problem
full_text: Trump's big swing at credit card interest rates targets a growing American problem. Americans' debt loads are at record highs, resurfacing a decadeslong debate on how to prevent companies from maximizing profit at consumers' expense.. President Donald Trump's proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10% comes as Americans' debt loads are at record highs.Alex Wong/Getty Images <ul><li>Trump called for a one-year cap on credit… [+4786 chars]
